segments.text: How do I buy my textbooks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have your book list for your class ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . Once you have it , you can go to the bookstore . Do you know where that is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know where the bookstore is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , so once you pass the gym , it's the first door on your left . Do you know you can also sell your used textbooks there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn't know I could do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You just take them with you and trade them with the used textbook man just outside the door . Do you think you will be going there today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you decide to go , I could meet you over there at 1
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , thank you . That would be great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , then , I'll talk to you later . Have a good day !
segments.speaker: S2
